nodes.text: Danstrom was a male soldier of the Galactic Republic stationed on Balmorra during 3642 BBY. While preparing for the assault on the Balmorran Arms Factory at the Sundari Flatlands, Danstrom and his squad were attacked by mutated Colicoid's from a nearby laboratory. Danstrom was eaten alive by the beasts, just as his commanding officer Captain Langstrom.
